description: Footage of the furry friend was taken in Ontario, Canada. It has more than 82,000 views on YouTube, where it was uploaded on Friday.
title: Video shows Canadian coyote using ball to play etch with itself
title_page: Video shows Canadian coyote using ball to play etch with itself | Daily Mail Online
text:
An adorable video shows a playful coyote in Canada using a dog's ball to play fetch with itself.
The canine is seen in a wooded area letting the ball roll, then running and catching up to it.
Once the coyote gets the ball in its mouth, the animal lets it drop again.
Scroll down for video
Play time! A playful coyote was caught on camera using a dog's ball to play fetch -- with itself
Hanging out: Footage of the furry friend was taken in Ontario, Canada
All fun and games: The canine is seen in a wooded area letting the ball roll, then running and catching up to it. Here, the coyote has the ball in its mouth
The coyote is also seen dashing about in the clip.
YouTube user Evnissyen posted the video online Friday, and said it was taken in Ontario.
The video's description said: 'I saw this guy playing on the hill while I was getting ready for work.
'It's pretty rare to see a coyote this close to the house at all, and totally unexpected to see one playing with the neighbour-dog's ball in broad daylight!'
On YouTube, the clip has more than 82,000 views.
Here we go again! Once the coyote gets the ball in its mouth, the animal lets it drop again
The fun never ends: The coyote is seen on top of a hill with the ball in its clutches
